Player History
Drafted in 58th round, 920th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/2015, off Hipolito Cañizares (CIN)...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/1/2016 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Hit first career homerun on 9/6/2017, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Released by Chicago on 9/21/2018...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2019 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/23/2019 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
